summary: DT:  THE CONTACT  RECEIVED A RECALL LETTER IN 6-2005. CONCERNING TRANS AXLE/FLOOR SHIFTER/IGNITION PARK INTERLOCK.   SHE WAS WAITING TO GET THE RECALL REPAIRS  DONE WHEN THE DEALER REPOSSED THE CAR ON 7-20-2005.  SHE TOLD DEALER ABOUT THE RECAL,  AND DEALER WAS NOT WORRIED ABOUT THE RECALL.   IF SOMEONE ELSE BOUGHT VEHICLE HE COULD GET IT FIXED. CONSUMER WANTED TO FILE A COMPLAINT BECAUSE SHE WAS AFRAID THAT SOMEONE WITH CHILDREN  WILL BUY THE CAR AND NOT BE AWARE OF THE RECALL. *AK
